congratulations Airly your dragons just sampled infected Mutant energeon.

=

Razor Claw roared as the second dragon bit down. There was still a chance =
for him to escape. The mutant transformed to his smaller wolverine form and=
 dove away from the jaws of death. His speed would keep the Predacons away =
but his wounds were slowly healing and he was still loseing energeon.

Bull=
et reared up on his hind legs and turned as Razor Claw slipped loose. the b=
ull gave the mutant a quick smile and dashed after the wolverine.

lla, he saw at Bullet came, he was hit but luckey he just got a unimportand=
 wound  near his stomach, but  Razorclaws had done other nead his troat. "A=
re you a Mole!!!!!???? or do you need that a doctor checks your optics????"=
 Shouted angry Attilla" 

  "It's my trund bro."said Luzbel to Attilla and =
witout warning, the trasmetal dragon  bit RazorCraw's troat behind his head=
, 

    CYBERWOLF4 <cyberwolf4@...> wrote: 

    Bullet smiled at t=
he chance for battle, "I'm shooting at the enemy but you got in the way." t=
ransforming to his bull mode he rushed forward at Razor Claw. 

    Razor C=
law squirmed until he got around to where he could reach Attila's throat wi=
th the claws on his feet. "It would seem we have a standoff, If you bite do=
wn again I'll slit your throat and we'll both be dead.

    Bullet "acciden=
tally" missed his target and threw himself horns first at Attilas stomach.

        shot off two c=
oncussion grenades at Luzbel. If anyone asked he'd say the

ot in the way when he shot at Razor Claw.
